Name: South of the Border
Ingredients: 25 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of float dehydrated lime slice wheel on foam.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: A strange mix of lime and coffee.
Nutrition: One serving of South of the Border contains 208 calories
